ChannelAttrs

Channel Attributes.

============================================================================

Parameters:
endianism Endiannism information currently not used.
mode Mode of channel (Input or output).
size Size of data sent on channel (16 bits or 32 bits). ============================================================================


typedef ChannelAttrs_tag ChannelAttrs

ChannelIOInfo

Information for adding or reclaiming a IO request.

============================================================================

Parameters:
buffer Buffer pointer.
size Size of buffer.
arg Argument to receive or send. ============================================================================


typedef ChannelIOInfo_tag ChannelIOInfo

ChannelMode

Mode of a channel.

============================================================================

Parameters:
ChannelMode_Input Indicates the channel as an Input channel (from DSP to GPP).
ChannelMode_Output Indicates the channel as an Output channel (from GPP to DSP). ============================================================================


enum  ChannelMode { ChannelMode_Input = 0x1u, ChannelMode_Output = 0x2u }

ChannelDataSize

Width of data being sent on channel.

============================================================================

Parameters:
ChannelDataSize_16bits Indicates the data to be transferred through the channel as 16 bit data.
ChannelDataSize_32bits Indicates the data to be transferred through the channel as 32 bit data. ============================================================================


enum  ChannelDataSize { ChannelDataSize_16bits = 1u, ChannelDataSize_32bits = 2u }
